column4: hmmm, i've installed samba (apt-get install samba) and under the general tab for "networking" there's nothing about windows networking. have i missed something?
i want to run a file called "et-linux-2.60.x86.run", am i doing right to cd to the directory and type ./et-linux-2.60.x86.run
yes but you need to make sure the file has executable permissions
